messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR JAMES CALLANDER
messages.content: I will run a positive and honest campaign, focussing on the issues that really matter to local people. I will represent the people of Midlothian within a United Kingdom, which I will work passionately to defend. I will work with local businesses to tackle soaring local unemployment and get the local economy back on its feet after the recession.

issues.economy: I will work with local businesses to tackle soaring local unemployment and get the local economy back on its feet after the recession.
issues.governance: I will represent the people of Midlothian within a United Kingdom, which I will work passionately to defend.

images.caption: JAMES CALLANDER - Vote for change in Midlothian on 6th May
